description: Trains QnA model on a cold start (unsupervised) basis with with pre-trained or trained embeddings and deploys the trained model to the ML Model Service

aMaxLen.description: Average length of question by number of tokens
aMaxLen.title: Answer length

deployModelName.description: Name of the model to be used for deployment (must be a valid DNS subdomain with no underscores)
deployModelName.title: Model Deployment Name

extraTrainingArgs.description: Add any additional arguments for the Python training scripts in this field
extraTrainingArgs.title: Extra training args for Python scripts

id.description: The ID for this job. Used in the API to reference this job. Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, dash (-) and underscore (_)
id.title: Job ID

infBatch.description: The batch size used in the validation loop
infBatch.title: Inference batch size

lowerCases.description: Whether to lower case all words in training, i.e. whether to treat upper case and lower case words equally.
lowerCases.title: Lower case all words

maxLen.description: Max length of question/answer by number of tokens
maxLen.title: Max Length

maxTokensNum.description: Drop document if the total words is greater than this value
maxTokensNum.title: Maximum number of words in doc

maxVocabSize.description: Maximum number of words in vocabulary, words will be trimmed if frequency is too low
maxVocabSize.title: Maximum vocabulary size

minTokensNum.description: Drop document if the total words is lower than this value
minTokensNum.title: Minimum number of words in doc

modelReplicas.description: How many replicas of the model should be deployed by Seldon Core
modelReplicas.title: Model replicas

numClusters.description: Number of clusters to be used for fast dense vector retrieval. Note no clustering will be applied if this is set to 0. If left blank, cluster count will be inferred by the job depending on the data
numClusters.title: Number of clusters

qMaxLen.description: Average length of question by number of tokens
qMaxLen.title: Question length

samplingProportion.description: The proportion of data to be sampled from the full dataset. Use a value between 0 and 1 for a proportion (e.g. 0.5 for 50%), or for a specific number of examples, use an integer larger than 1. Leave blank for no sampling
samplingProportion.title: Sampling proportion

scaleOnly.description: Run job but only adjust Seldon Core replica count (no training)
scaleOnly.title: Scale Seldon Core Replica Deployment Only

sparkConfig.description: Provide additional key/value pairs to be injected into the training JSON map at runtime. Values will be inserted as-is, so use " to surround string values
sparkConfig.title: Additional parameters

testMode.description: If set to true, then the training will exit after the first iteration. Useful for ensuring that the end-to-end pipeline is working
testMode.title: Test Mode

textColName.description: Field which contains the documents that will be used to learn about the vocabulary. If multiple fields, please separate them by comma, e.g. question,answer.
textColName.title: Field which contains the content documents

topKClusters.description: How many closest clusters the model can find for each query. At retrieval time, all answers in top k nearest clusters will be returned and reranked
topKClusters.title: Top k of clusters to return

unidecode.description: Use Unidecode library to transform Unicode input into ASCII transliterations
unidecode.title: Apply unicode decoding

useCustomEmbeddings.description: Choose this option when there are many uncommon words or jargons in data. NOTE: please look at log for warning about percentage of covered vocabulary words, if this proportion is less than 80%, please set this parameter to true and do not use the pre-trained embeddings shipped with our package
useCustomEmbeddings.title: Use custom embeddings

w2vEpochs.description: Number of epochs to train custom Word2Vec embeddings
w2vEpochs.title: Word2Vec training epochs

w2vVectorSize.description: Word-vector dimensionality to represent text (suggested dimension ranges: 100~150
w2vVectorSize.title: Size of word vectors

w2vWindowSize.description: The window size (context words from [-window, window]) for Word2Vec
w2vWindowSize.title: Word2Vec window size

title: QnA Coldstart Training
